folders.description: A list of folder configuration to store different elements of the API construct

actionFunctions.description: A folder to store action functions that will be call directly by the ACTION end point

models.description: A folder to store models, the generator will create a Request and a Response subfolder to further organize models

schemas.description: A folder where schemas can be found

test.description: A folder to store test for TDD implementations like Jest and Jenkings

validation.description: A folder to store validation functions that will be call directly by the ACTION end point
